title: What BMS services does NexSys Technologies provide?
bodyTitle: What BMS services does NexSys Technologies provide?
bodyText: We provide comprehensive Building Management System solutions including HVAC control, lighting automation, energy management, security integration, fire safety systems, and IoT-based smart building technologies. Our services cover design, installation, commissioning, and ongoing maintenance.

title: How long does BMS implementation take?
bodyTitle: How long does BMS implementation take?
bodyText: Implementation timeline varies based on building size and complexity. Typically, small to medium buildings take 2-4 weeks, while large commercial complexes may require 6-12 weeks. We provide detailed project timelines during the initial consultation phase.

title: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
bodyTitle: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
bodyText: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance packages including 24/7 monitoring, preventive maintenance, emergency support, system updates, and performance optimization. Our support team ensures your BMS operates at peak efficiency year-round.

title: How much do BMS solutions cost?
bodyTitle: How much do BMS solutions cost?
bodyText: BMS costs vary depending on building size, system complexity, and specific requirements. We offer customized solutions to fit each client's budget and needs. Contact us for a free consultation and detailed quote tailored to your project.
